backend/main.mo: Defines the chat backend actor with channel, message, attachment, user profile types, persistent state, authorization mixins, storage mixins, and XP/level calculation helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for PWA, offline mode, notifications, and offline messaging.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend files, including components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file configuring PWA metadata, icons, manifest link, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, start URL, display mode, shortcuts, and categories.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, offline fallbacks, and network/caching strategies for assets and navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component registering the service worker, handling identity and backend initialization, showing profile setup, and rendering the chat layout.
frontend/src/components/ChannelSettingsD: Provides a dialog for configuring channel settings, including random join toggling and setting or removing a max member limit. Uses hooks to fetch and update channel details.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Renders messages for the active channel, handles loading states, notifications, scrolling, and access checks. Integrates message fetching, user state, and channel admin tools.
frontend/src/components/ChatLayout.tsx: Defines the main chat layout with header, sidebar, chat area, and message input. Manages channel selection, sidebar visibility, and online status handling.
frontend/src/components/CommandEducation: Displays rotating command instructions and app statistics when no channel is selected. Provides animated transitions and a help interface for new users.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with theme toggle, authentication controls, notifications, and user info. Displays app title and user level progress when available.
frontend/src/components/LeaveChannelDial: Shows a confirmation dialog for leaving a channel, with delete options for admins. Calls back with the chosen leave action.
frontend/src/components/LevelProgressBar: Fetches and animates the user’s level progress bar. Displays current level and a smooth progress indicator.
frontend/src/components/LiveRecordingWav: Canvas-based animated audio waveform that updates bar heights from live audio levels and handles resizing.
frontend/src/components/MediaLibraryDial: Dialog for selecting and uploading images, GIFs, and documents with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays chat messages with media attachments, linkified text, avatars, timestamps, and download support.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input supporting commands, channel actions, media attachments, and voice recording with animated placeholder text.
frontend/src/components/OfflineBanner.ts: Simple banner warning the user when offline.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with username input and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/RotatingAppStati: Cycles through global app statistics with timed fade transitions.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Displays channel lists with loading, error, and empty states and allows selecting channels based on actor and query status.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component that loads an audio URL, handles play/pause, tracks progress, and displays a waveform bar and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/VoiceRecorderPan: UI panel for recording and previewing voice messages with discard, stop, play/pause, and send controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorExtended.ts: Enhanced actor hook providing retry, error state, readiness flags, and optional admin initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, login/logout flow, and exposing identity status through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Manages browser notification permission, enabling/disabling notifications, and showing notifications when allowed.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, channels, and app stats using an actor API with online checks and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Implements a voice recording hook using MediaRecorder and Web Audio API, offering recording controls, duration tracking, and audio level monitoring.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, including WhatsApp-style chat colors and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/linkify.ts: Parses text for URLs and splits it into text and link segments using a regex-based utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app by mounting root, setting up React Query, and wrapping the app with Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page with branding, feature highlights, and a button to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the app’s current feature set and versions, including authentication, actor handling, roles, profiles, XP/leveling, and global statistics.
